FAQ

Blockbuster is a streaming service offering movies, TV shows, and nostalgia-driven content.
You can subscribe through our Subscription Plans page, which offers Free, Standard, and Superstar options.
Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime from your account settings.
There are no hidden fees. However, rentals for Free Plan users may incur charges.
Blockbuster is available on desktop, tablet and mobile.
